item.title: 英伟达黄仁勋称对OpenAI的投资"从未构成承诺"
item.description: 英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋表示，该公司拟向OpenAI投资1000亿美元的计划“从未构成承诺”，并将对任何融资轮次采取“逐轮审议”的态度。【原文：Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang said the company’s proposed $100 billion investment in OpenAI was “never a commitment” and that the company would consider any funding rounds “one at a time.”】

item.title: 印度寻求海外侨民资本，因外国资金撤离本土股市
item.description: 印度正试图吸引更多海外侨民资金流入本土股市，因全球资金正因企业盈利担忧及他处更具吸引力的回报而撤离。【原文：India is seeking to draw more money from its overseas nationals into local equities as global funds pull back amid concerns over corporate earnings and more attractive returns elsewhere.】

item.title: 受地缘政治因素影响，沙特股市创六月以来最大跌幅，金价回落
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯股市周日创下近八个月最大跌幅，全球金属抛售潮冲击当地矿业股，同时关于美国、伊朗和以色列可能卷入军事冲突的猜测持续升温。【原文：Saudi Arabian equities dropped the most in almost eight months on Sunday as a global metals selloff hit local miners and speculation intensified over the possibility of military attacks involving the US, Iran and Israel.】

item.title: 印度将核设备进口关税豁免期延长至2035年
item.description: 印度财政部长尼尔玛拉·西塔拉曼在周日的预算演讲中表示，印度将继续对核电设备进口提供现行免税政策，直至2035年，且不受项目规模限制。【原文：India will continue to offer the existing tax waivers for imports of nuclear power equipment until 2035, regardless of the size of the projects, Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman said in her budget speech on Sunday.】

item.title: 印度推出20年税收优惠政策以吸引全球数据中心
item.description: 印度将为在该国提供全球数据中心服务的海外企业提供长达二十年的免税期，以加大吸引投资者力度，推动其快速发展的数字基础设施领域。【原文：India will offer a two-decade tax holiday to overseas firms that provide global data center services from the country, stepping up efforts to woo investors in its fast-growing digital infrastructure sector.】

item.title: 印度将把金融中心免税期延长一倍以促进商业发展
item.description: 印度预算文件显示，该国将延长其国际金融中心的免税期，以提升该地对外国企业的吸引力。【原文：India will extend a tax-holiday at its international finance hub to boost the appeal for foreign businesses setting up shop there, according to the country’s budget documents.】

item.title: 印度央行预计将再次创下股息支付纪录
item.description: 印度政府周日提交议会的预算文件显示，该国预计在4月开始的新财年中，将从央行及国有金融机构获得创纪录的3.16万亿卢比（约合344亿美元）股息。【原文：India expects to receive a record 3.16 trillion rupees ($34.4 billion) in dividends from its central bank and state-owned financial institutions in the fiscal year starting in April, according to budget documents tabled in the Parliament on Sunday.】

item.title: 印度在1300亿美元预算推动下加大基础设施支出力度
item.description: 印度计划在下一财年投入12.2万亿卢比（约合1330亿美元）用于基础设施建设，较去年增长约9%。莫迪政府正加大支出力度，以加速推进交通和物流网络的全面改造。【原文：India plans to invest 12.2 trillion rupees ($133 billion) in infrastructure in the next financial year, about a 9% increase from last year, as Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s government steps up spending to accelerate an overhaul of transport and logistics networks.】

item.title: 印度计划提高股票衍生品交易税
item.description: 印度上调了部分股票交易的税率，旨在进一步遏制散户投资者的投机交易。【原文：India raised taxes on some equity transactions in a bid to further stem speculative trading by retail investors.】

item.title: 印度电子制造类股因预算提振而跳涨
item.description: 印度电子制造服务公司股价周日上涨，此前财政部长拨出4000亿卢比（43亿美元）用于提振该行业，并使印度成为该领域的全球枢纽。【原文：Shares of India’s electronics manufacturing services companies rose on Sunday after the finance minister set aside 400 billion rupees ($4.3 billion) to boost the sector and position the country as a global hub for the sector.】

item.title: 莫迪创纪录的1870亿美元债务发行将给印度债券市场带来压力
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉·莫迪领导的政府计划在即将到来的财政年度发行创纪录规模的债券，此举可能在需求疲软之际给当地债券市场带来更大压力。【原文：Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s government plans to sell a record amount of bonds in the coming fiscal year, a move that risks adding further pressure to local debt markets amid waning demand.】

item.title: 比特币跌破8万美元关口，预示信心危机再度来袭
item.description: 价格、相关性、信心——比特币正同时流失这三者。【原文：Price, relevance, conviction — Bitcoin is bleeding all three.】

item.title: 印尼允许埃隆·马斯克旗下Grok在禁令后恢复服务
item.description: 印度尼西亚已允许人工智能工具Grok恢复服务，此前该工具因生成色情内容遭禁用，埃隆·马斯克旗下的X平台向政府作出保证后，印尼政府解除了禁令。【原文：Indonesia has permitted the artificial intelligence tool Grok to resume service after Elon Musk’s X provided assurances to the government following its ban for producing sexualized content.】

item.title: 澳门博彩收入因娱乐项目表现优异而超出预期
item.description: 澳门1月份博彩收入增长24%，超出分析师预期。作为全球最大的赌博中心，澳门赌场继续依靠免费演唱会门票和娱乐活动等优惠措施吸引高消费旅客。【原文：Macau’s gaming revenue rose 24% in January, beating analyst estimates as casinos in the world’s biggest gambling hub continued to rely on perks like free concert tickets and entertainment offerings to lure high-spending travelers.】

item.title: 日本经济大臣高市早苗澄清竞选集会上关于日元疲软的言论
item.description: 日本首相高市早苗就其关于日元疲软的言论作出澄清，强调她仅是主张有必要打造能够抵御汇率波动的经济体系。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi sought to clarify her comments about the weak yen, emphasizing that she only intended to argue for a need to create an economy that can withstand currency fluctuations.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，阿布扎比王室收购了特朗普加密货币企业的股份
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》援引公司文件及知情人士报道，阿布扎比王室成员曾与特朗普家族签署秘密协议，收购其加密货币项目的股权。【原文：An Abu Dhabi royal signed a secret deal with the Trump family to buy a stake in their cryptocurrency venture, the Wall Street Journal reported, citing company documents and people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印尼煤炭协会称配额削减恐致矿井停产
item.description: 印度尼西亚煤炭矿主协会表示，政府大幅削减生产配额可能迫使部分矿场停产，这将加剧该国本已举步维艰的煤炭行业困境。【原文：The Indonesian Coal Miners Association said drastic cuts in production quotas granted by the government may force some operations to shutdown, adding to the woes of the country’s already beleaguered industry.】

item.title: 前微软Windows部门负责人曾就职业发展向爱泼斯坦寻求建议
item.description: 据美国司法部公布的文件显示，微软公司前高管史蒂文·西诺夫斯基在协商离职条款并规划未来动向期间，曾寻求杰弗里·爱泼斯坦的建议。【原文：Former senior Microsoft Corp. executive Steven Sinofsky sought Jeffrey Epstein’s advice as he negotiated the terms of his exit from the company and worked through what to do next, according to documents made public by the Justice Department.】

item.title: 韩国誓言加快投资法进程以应对美国关税风险
item.description: 韩国产业部长官金正宽在结束赴美磋商后承诺，将迅速落实美国要求的投资立法。他表示此次磋商有助于消除双方在关税问题上的误解。【原文：South Korea will move swiftly to implement investment legislation sought by the US, Industry Minister Kim Jung-kwan pledged after returning from talks in America that he said helped clear up misunderstandings over tariffs.】

item.title: 韩国出口势头因强劲的半导体需求而增强
item.description: 韩国1月份出口延续增长势头，这得益于强劲的半导体需求以及因有利的日历效应导致的工作日数量较上年同期增加。【原文：South Korea’s exports extended their growth streak in January, underpinned by robust semiconductor demand and an increase in the number of working days from a year earlier because of the effects of a favorable calendar.】

item.title: 印度预算料将平衡就业推动与财政纪律
item.description: 印度财政部长尼尔玛拉·西塔拉曼预计将在周日的预算案中优先考虑创造就业的增长，同时强调财政审慎，因为该国正面临地缘政治风险和美国高额关税的双重压力。【原文：India’s Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman is expected to prioritize job-creating growth while emphasizing fiscal prudence in Sunday’s budget, as the country grapples with geopolitical risks and steep US tariffs.】

item.title: 执政的泰党以民族主义和建制派选票为竞选纲领
item.description: 泰国大选前一周，总理阿努廷·查恩维拉库尔踏上柬泰边境，身着政府制服外罩防护装备，在风中飘扬的国旗下与前线士兵合影。【原文：Just over a week before Thailand’s general election, Prime Minister Anutin Charnvirakul trekked to the Thai-Cambodian border and posed with frontline soldiers as the national flag fluttered in the breeze, protective gear layered over his government uniform.】

item.title: 欧元反弹成为欧洲央行通胀展望的最新风险
item.description: 欧元汇率的飙升势必成为欧洲央行今年首次政策会议的焦点议题。【原文：The surge in the euro is set to loom large over the European Central Bank’s first policy meeting of the year.】

item.title: 人工智能热潮正引发软件公司贷款危机：《信贷周刊》
item.description: 在信贷市场普遍乐观的情绪中，一种债务正面临日益增长的担忧。【原文：Amid broad euphoria in credit markets, one type of debt is facing growing fear.】

item.title: Waymo寻求约160亿美元融资，估值逼近1100亿美元
item.description: 据知情人士透露，谷歌母公司Alphabet旗下的自动驾驶部门Waymo正计划进行新一轮融资，目标筹集约160亿美元资金，此轮融资将使该部门估值接近1100亿美元。【原文：Waymo, Alphabet Inc.’s autonomous driving unit, is aiming to raise about $16 billion in a financing round that would value the unit at nearly $110 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 比特币跌破8万美元大关，加密货币暴跌势头加速
item.description: 比特币在纽约周六午后早盘交易中暴跌，跌破8万美元大关，跌至2025年4月以来的最低水平。【原文：Bitcoin fell sharply in early Saturday afternoon trading in New York, tumbling below $80,000 mark to hit levels last seen in April 2025.】

item.title: 私募信贷忧虑困扰最大收购公司的股价
item.description: 交易量正在回升，客户分红增加，年度利润预计将增长——但华尔街另类投资巨头的股价却遭遇十年最差一月表现，源于投资者日益加剧的忧虑情绪。【原文：Dealmaking is rebounding, client payouts are up and annual profits are expected to rise — but shares of Wall Street’s alternative-investing giants are off to their worst January in a decade over a slurry of mounting investor anxieties.】

item.title: 印尼股市暴跌后将调查股价操纵行为
item.description: 印尼表示将严厉打击操纵股价的行为，并加快推进金融改革，当局正加大力度恢复市场对该国资产市场的信心。【原文：Indonesia said it will crack down on stock manipulators and accelerate financial reforms as authorities step up efforts to restore confidence in its asset markets.】

item.title: 特朗普的美元“溜溜球”让股市投资者将目光投向海外
item.description: 对唐纳德·特朗普总统而言，美元如同他能随意操控的溜溜球。但对股票投资者来说，这玩具似乎坏掉了——美元走弱如今已成为他们评估股票时必须应对的最新障碍。【原文：To President Donald Trump, the dollar is like a yo-yo that he can make go up and down. To equity investors, the toy looks broken — and a weaker dollar is now the latest obstacle they have to contend with when valuing stocks.】

item.title: 俄罗斯摩尔曼斯克港口因电力中断暂停运营
item.description: 据国际文传电讯社报道，由于摩尔曼斯克及邻近城市塞维洛莫尔斯克发生电力中断，俄罗斯摩尔曼斯克散货码头和商业海港的运营已暂时暂停。【原文：Operations at Russia’s Murmansk Bulk Terminal and Commercial Seaport were temporarily suspended due to power disruptions in Murmansk and the nearby city of Severomorsk, according to Interfax.】
